context: Outstanding debts were also agreed and the company permitted to export 250 tons of <a0_0><b6_0>saltpetre<b6_0/><a0_0/>. Again in <a1_0><b5_0>1673<b5_0/><a1_0/>, Banks successfully negotiated another contract for 700 tons of saltpetre at <a4_0><b8_0>£37,000<b8_0/><a4_0/> between the king and the company. So urgent was the need to supply the <a2_0><b7_0>armed forces<b7_0/><a2_0/> in the United Kingdom, America and elsewhere that the authorities sometimes turned a blind eye on the untaxed sales.
